amendment.description: To provide for the concurrence by the Senate in the House amendment to the Senate amendments to H.R. 3997, with an amendment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3890 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S16048) To provide for the concurrence by the Senate in the House amendment to the Senate amendments to H.R. 3997, with an amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3890 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
